issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Deleting a load balancer immediately after creation fails:

{code}
eulb-create-lb -z PARTI00 -l "lb-port=8888, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=8888, instance-protocol=HTTP" Balancer1; eulb-delete-lb Balancer1
{code}

the error in the log is:

{code}
Wed Jun 19 13:34:48 2013 ERROR [LoadBalancingService:LoadBalancing.16] [com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.LoadBalancingService.deleteLoadBalancer(LoadBalancingService.java):728] Error deleting the loadbalancer: could not delete: [com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.LoadBalancer#8aef81e53f59a274013f5e258e733559]
org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not delete: [com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.LoadBalancer#8aef81e53f59a274013f5e258e733559]
        at org.hibernate.exception.SQLStateConverter.convert(SQLStateConverter.java:96)
        at org.hibernate.exception.JDBCExceptionHelper.convert(JDBCExceptionHelper.java:66)
        at org.hibernate.persister.entity.AbstractEntityPersister.delete(AbstractEntityPersister.java:2712)
        at org.hibernate.persister.entity.AbstractEntityPersister.delete(AbstractEntityPersister.java:2895)
        at org.hibernate.action.EntityDeleteAction.execute(EntityDeleteAction.java:97)
        at org.hibernate.engine.ActionQueue.execute(ActionQueue.java:267)

        at org.hibernate.impl.SessionImpl.managedFlush(SessionImpl.java:375)
        at org.hibernate.transaction.JDBCTransaction.commit(JDBCTransaction.java:137)
        at org.hibernate.ejb.TransactionImpl.commit(TransactionImpl.java:76)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx$TxState.commit(Entities.java:942)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx.commit(Entities.java:800)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$TransactionalFunction.apply(Entities.java:1051)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$4.apply(Entities.java:1100)
        at com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.LoadBalancers.deleteLoadbalancer(LoadBalancers.java:189)
        at com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.LoadBalancingService.deleteLoadBalancer(LoadBalancingService.java:716)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor962.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:601)
        at org.mule.model.resolvers.AbstractEntryPointResolver.invokeMethod(AbstractEntryPointResolver.java:147)

        at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.invokeComponentInstance(AbstractJavaComponent.java:82)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.doOnCall(AbstractJavaComponent.java:73)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractComponent.onCall(AbstractComponent.java:87)
        at org.mule.model.seda.SedaService$ComponentStageWorker.run(SedaService.java:533)
        at org.mule.work.WorkerContext.run(WorkerContext.java:310)
        at edu.emory.mathcs.backport.java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:665)

Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: update or delete on table "metadata_loadbalancer" violates foreign key constraint "fk15ea9fc45d929353" on table "metadata_listener"
  Detail: Key (id)=(8aef81e53f59a274013f5e258e733559) is still referenced from table "metadata_listener".

comments.body: [~sjones], please reopen this issue if still seen in CI or manual testing
